Notes: *In this study, there were two trials (two groups of fluox, two groups of placebo). CDRS scores were reported per trial (fluox v placebo; fluox v placebo)
*Did not report demographics (e.g. mean age, % of women) per trial. Instead, demographics were reported for the two trials combined, hence the (combined)
*Did not report secondary outcome measures per trial. Instead they reported MADRS & HAM-D scores for the combined population, hence why n is larger.
